name: illegitimately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not legal or fair: The protesters say he took power illegitimately and are demanding new elections. This ensures that taxpayers' money is not being claimed illegitimately. Opposite
legitimately
If a child is born illegitimately, their parents are not married to each other: Peter had been born illegitimately and was brought up by his mother alone. She was one of seven children he fathered illegitimately with Mary.
